version_description:
Fixed issue some users experienced launching bug reporter
Fix for rare crash on game boot
Fix for crash on exiting
Protection against rare match crash
Fixed rare crash in captaincy news item
Fixed crash when navigating back to scout result page after deleting assignment
Fixed possible crash in medical centre
Fix for rare crash setting up storage folder
Fixed some translations
Fixed rare crash in startup flow

Fixed issue some users experienced launching bug reporter
Fix for rare crash on game boot
Fix for crash on exiting
Protection against rare match crash
Fixed rare crash in captaincy news item
Fixed crash when navigating back to scout result page after deleting assignment
Fixed possible crash in medical centre
Fix for rare crash setting up storage folder
Fixed some translations
Fixed rare crash in startup flow

Updated some data
Updated some translations
Tweaks to title challenge narratives
Some fixes to improve reliability of match
Fixed Korean date format in match screens
Give key players more chances to play even if their form is initially bad at a club
Fixed issue where player was duplicated on home menu medical centre
Fixed some issues with clause calculations
Made some improvements to contract negotiations
Fixed some club/kit colour issues
Encouraged assistant to loan out more players
Fixed Club World Championship
Toned down tendency of big clubs to overspend
Various rare crash fixes
Various user interface tweaks

13.1.1

Many other fixes and improvements - see community.sigames.com for full details
